ygData.subject: Re: On flirting and getting stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Maria, I love it.  Zuzu, my troll warrior, is the only one of all my girls who flirts.  She gets tons of attention from it and if it gets out of line she just
ygData.messageBody:
Maria, I love it. Zuzu, my troll warrior, is the only one of all my girls
who flirts. She gets tons of attention from it and if it gets out of line
she just tells them: "Use leve Zuzu lone or she barsh use on de hed und use
no like dat fur sure. Har de har. " They even get a kick out of that.
hehe I find it much easier to flirt with Zuzu because she has a built in
ability to fuss at males with her role and personality. It makes it easier
to stop it before it gets too intense. She once had a troll male say: "Zuzu
cute, we go make baby now." Zuzu just smiled, drooled and told him in her
worst troll accent: " Zuzu too purdy ta be makin babies wif ugly troll lak
use be. Zuzu waits fer purdy bard mans. " He laughed and gave her a
shield. hehe.

Enjoy your troll. We need more female trolls. <smiles>


Janice

----- Original Message -----
From: Maria Haskins <haskins@...>
To: <EQ_women@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 20, 1999 5:32 PM
Subject: [EQ_women] On flirting and getting stuff


> From: "Maria Haskins" <haskins@...>
>
> Hello all sisters...
> Well, after playing a goodie-two-shoes cleric since I first got into the
> game, I decided recently to check out how the other side lives and started
a
> female troll shadow knight. The swamp was a new experience alright, and so
> was the famed troll regeneration (watch those HPs zoooom up!). But the
> funniest thing was when I flirted with an ogre warrior in Grobb (some big
> bad 'un with a last name). After all the recent discussion here on
flirting
> and females getting items, I decided to try out my trollie charms on this
> ogre. All I did was to comment (in my well spoken troll dialect) on what a
> fine basher he seemed to be and emote ":bats her eyelashes at [player]"
and
> all of a sudden I received 1 platinum! For a lvl 2 trollie SK, this was
> indeed a fine gift... I guess trollie women have something to teach my
> dwarven cleric when it comes to turning mens heads because my cleric never
> received such a fine gift... :)
> After this encounter, my trollie character is convinced she is indeed
> attractive, but I doubt she will carry her flirting further than the
> eyelashes at the moment. Still it's proof that it's not just the wood
elves
> that can make a killing by flirting... :) /em smiles fiercely
>
> Gobba, alias Disa, alias me
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Congratulations to "PAFind," our latest ONElist of the Week.
> http://www.onelist.com
> How is ONElist changing YOUR life? Visit our homepage and let us know!
